name: OLIVANZA Premium Reserve
description: Our flagship extra virgin olive oil, recognized with international gold medals. Harvested from Pakistan's finest olive orchards, this premium reserve offers a harmonious blend of fruity notes with a delicate peppery finish. A true celebration of Pakistani excellence.

additionalInfo.storage: Store in a cool, dark place away from direct sunlight

name: OLIVANZA Heritage Edition
description: A limited edition masterpiece showcasing Pakistan's rich agricultural heritage. Carefully selected from mature olive trees, this edition embodies the perfect balance between tradition and innovation. Each bottle tells the story of Pakistani craftsmanship on the world stage.

additionalInfo.storage: Keep refrigerated after opening for extended freshness

name: OLIVANZA Classic Selection
description: Our signature blend capturing the essence of Pakistan's olive cultivation success story. With vibrant green hues and fresh, herbaceous notes, this classic selection delivers authentic flavor while supporting sustainable farming practices across Pakistani communities.

additionalInfo.storage: Best consumed within 18 months of bottling date
